message: The many ways of communication bouncing around here is mind boggling :) I sent you a PM in the forums about the icons you sent me in email. I have my skype open, logged into gmail, logged in to Steam and on here in case one of those four ways is someone's optimal channel of communication. Makes you laugh..
I would rate things as thus: 1) e-mail (Forum PM is fundamentally e-mail) 2) Forum
I always check the forums first, so I see the PMs fastest, too..
